entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
